translations: v.使小型化，使微型化；使成为缩影

sentences.sentence: We will miniaturize your stature and end your careers!
sentences.translation: 我们就微缩你们的身材，让你们的事业也完蛋！

sentences.sentence: The filter is reduced in size and can be used to miniaturize the circuit.
sentences.translation: 该结构滤波器的尺寸显著减小，从而有利于实现电路的小型化。

sentences.sentence: An object of the present invention is to miniaturize a circuit board connector.
sentences.translation: 本发明的一个目的是将电路板连接器小型化。
